description: Lets say that You have a table called Employees that has information about the Employees of a company, including the date the employee was hired(HireDate) and You want to find out all the employees hired in the last 'n' months.
query:
SELECT *, DATEDIFF(MONTH, HireDate, GETDATE()) as Diff
FROM Employees
WHERE DATEDIFF(MONTH, HireDate, GETDATE()) between 0 and 3
ORDER BY HireDate DESC;
